TopicTitle: Asteroid and Ship transfer to orbit.

Articles.Content: Hello everyone. It's been a long time since playing KSP. I used to have a mod that allows you to place an asteroid or ship into a selected orbit and I can't find it and can't remember which mod it was. Anyone have a clue?![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Sounds like Hyperedit. 

(And moved to the modding section.)
